Name: Skill 1
Desc: Primal Projection will block attacks and will counterattack after 4 blocks. Stronger counterattacks will be triggered if the enemy is in the berserk phase.

Name: Skill 2
Desc: In the Berserk status, Primal Projection could push away the character and launch a slash that cannot be dodged by Super Armor after blocking 4 times.

Name: Skill 3
Desc: Primal Projection will stop time and launch an attack upon entering the berserk phase. You can dodge the attack before getting hit.

Name: Skill 4
Desc: Primal Projection will catch character during its Wrath Form.

Name: Skill 5
Desc: Primal Projection will launch triple attacks upon entering the berserk phase. Attacks can be parried.

Name: Skill 6
Desc: Primal Projection could rush forward and attack after blocking 4 attacks in the berserk phase. The attack can be parried.

Name: Skill 7
Desc: Primal Projection could slash downward once after blocking 4 attacks in the berserk phase. The attack can be parried.

Name: Skill 8
Desc: Primal Projection will cast a Parry Skill when berserk gauge is empty. If the parry succeeds, it will enter the paralysis status. Otherwise, it will restore 50% Rage.

Name: Skill 1
Desc: Once Echo enters her Rage Form, Cecily will launch continuous coordinated attacks that can be parried with Echo.

Name: Skill 2
Desc: Once Echo enters her Rage Form, Cecily will launch continuous coordinated attacks that can be parried with Echo.

Name: Skill 3
Desc: Echo fires an arrow to control your character before launching powerful attacks.

Name: Skill 4
Desc: Echo fires arrows at you after jumping forward into the air.

Name: Skill 5
Desc: Echo climbs to the top of the pillar before leaping up to attack.

Name: Skill 6
Desc: Echo rushes forward to launch a kick that can be parried.

Name: Skill 7
Desc: Echo fires a powerful shot after charging. This attack can be parried.

Name: Skill 8
Desc: When Echo exits her Rage Form for the first time, she will launch 3 attacks that can be parried.

Name: Skill 1
Desc: Perfect Parry can be achieved when you use a different type of skill every time you Parry Veronica's attacks. Veronica will enter Fatigue once you achieve Perfect Parry.

Name: Skill 2
Desc: Veronica will unleash Multi-Parry. Veronica will enter Fatigue once you achieve multiple Perfect Parries.

Name: Skill 3
Desc: Veronica will unleash Multi-Parry. Veronica will enter Fatigue once you achieve multiple Perfect Parries.

Name: Skill 4
Desc: Veronica soars into the sky to unleash a powerful attack that can be parried.

Name: Skill 5
Desc: Veronica will launch Throw Skill that can only be evaded by Dodge.

Name: Skill 6
Desc: Veronica hurls her weapon to unleash a Shock Wave.

Name: Skill 7
Desc: Veronica will unleash a straight attack that cannot be dodged or avoided with invincibility frames.

Name: Skill 8
Desc: Veronica slashes towards the ground and deals DMG to its enemies using the shockwave.

Name: Skill 9
Desc: Trigger Matrix when attacked during Post-Action to parry the attack and launch a powerful counterattack (unlock this skill after entering Rage Form a second time)

Name: Skill 1
Desc: Powered will lose control in the Berserk Phase and launch triple Anti-Matrix Attacks.

Name: Skill 2
Desc: Powered will dash forward. Perform an Extreme Dodge to avoid the attack to make Powered enter the Imbalance Status.

Name: Skill 3
Desc: Powered will dash to the side. Perform an Extreme Dodge to avoid the attack to make Powered enter the Imbalance Status.

Name: Skill 4
Desc: Powered will jump up and then slam. Perform an Extreme Dodge to avoid the attack to make Powered enter the Imbalance Status.

Name: Skill 5
Desc: Powered shoots laser beams through its eyes. The laser beams are a double combo that can be parried.

Name: Skill 6
Desc: Powered will launch three attacks that can be parried after the Berserk Phase.

Name: Skill 7
Desc: In the Berserk Status, Powered will charge and then dash forward, swinging its tail to catch the character.

Name: Skill 8
Desc: Powered will launch triple melee attacks. The last attack can be parried.

Name: Rapid Slash
Desc: Mirrored Vergil performs Iaido, dashes forward, and draws blade to slash surrounding targets.

Name: Yamato - Slice
Desc: Mirrored Vergil performs Iaido, performs a chain of slashes, and deals damage on hit.

Name: Skyfall Slash
Desc: Mirrored Vergil flashes to midair and performs a downward slash with his weapon, knocking the target to the ground.

Name: Judgment Cut
Desc: Mirrored Vergil performs laido and launches a Judgment Cut at the target location.

Name: Mirage Blades
Desc: Mirrored Vergil gathers the demonic power to create Mirage Blades and fires at the target.

Name: Heavy Rain Blade Array
Desc: Mirrored Vergil summons a large amount of Mirage Blades above the target and makes them fall down like a storm to attack the target.

Name: Heart Piercer
Desc: Mirrored Vergil charges and dashes forward, thrusting his weapon into the target, controlling the target, and dealing massive damage.

Name: Judgment Cut End
Desc: Mirrored Vergil performs a powerful laido, launches an extremely powerful Judgment Cut, and attacks all surrounding targets.

Name: Dive Bomb
Desc: Mirrored Vergil enters the SDT Form, hovers around the battlefield, and seeks opportunities to launch powerful impacts.

Name: Skill 1
Desc: In the Knight Form, Enora Lueya fires armor gauntlets, jumps up into the air, and smashes the ground hard.

Name: Skill 2
Desc: In the Knight Form, Enora Lueya falls back and fires at the enemy.

Name: Skill 3
Desc: In the Knight Form, Enora Lueya leaps up into the air and throws a heavy punch at the enemy.

Name: Skill 4
Desc: In the Knight Form, Enora Lueya creates a boxing ring and uses the ring ropes to throw accelerated heavy punches at the enemy.

Name: Skill 5
Desc: In the Knight Form, Enora Lueya smashes the ground and teleports to the distance to fire light beams at the enemy.

Name: Skill 6
Desc: In the Knight Form, Enora Lueya quickly throws powerful punches at the enemy.
